ComicInfo.Summary:
High Voltage: A man with an irrational fear of electricity kills his electrical engineer brother. He's then sentenced to death and is executed by the electric chair.
The Planet Eaters: Earthmen land on a planet and find only ruins of what was once an advanced civilization. They notice the planet is overrun with living plant life. The men manage to make it back to their ship and return to Earth. A scientist had brought a sample on board for study, but it begins to grow at an enormous rate and takes over the ship. They realize it was the plants that destroyed that planet's civilization and if they land, this specimen will grow and destroy Earth's civilization to. They decide to blow up their ship before they land, but bits and pieces of the plants drift down towards the city.
Death Takes a Holiday: A man who works for a holiday novelty company is framed by his partners for embezzlement. He escapes from prison and vows revenge on his partners by killing them on holidays. One he shoots with an arrow on Valentine's Day. One he kills with an axe on Washington's birthday, and the last one he blows up on Independance Day. When the cops track him down, he gets crushed by a tank during a parade for Armstice Day!
A Stone's Throw From Eternity: Paul is obsessed with the secrets of life. He tracks down the mysterious Punja who gives him a book showing his previous life before he was reincarnated but warns him not to read the last page as it will reveal his destiny. Later when Paul tries to kill his father, his father defends himself by throwing a projectile at him killing him. The last page of Punja's book shows Paul was Goliath in a previous life.
Spirits From Outer Space: Spirits from the dead on planet Kyblos have been attacking spacemen from Earth so they can eventually take over humanity by possessing thier bodies. One spaceman finds out that they don't like pain and will flee a human host if attacked. After freeing his buddy from a spirit that was possessing him, the two men rally the troops and attack Kyblos stopping the malevolent spirits at their source.
ComicInfo.Title: High Voltage; The Planet Eaters; Death Takes a Holiday; A Stone's Throw From Eternity; Spirits From Outer Space
